text: chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha ao banda khnhom del mean chomnue. chaur puok anak kaotakhlach champoh mcheasa robsa puok anak . kar tabasnang da la ( now thngai barlok) ku samreab anak del ban sang ampeula nowknong lokey nih . haey phendei robsa a l laoh ku toulomtouleay . pit brakd nasa banda anak del atthmot nung trauv ke phdal aoy nouv phalbony robsa puokke yeang penhlenh daoy itakonnea
